sources.title: The Atomic Kid
sources.description: Title: The Atomic Kid Summary: A uranium prospector is eating a peanut butter sandwich in the desert where atom bomb tests are being done. He becomes radioactive, and helps the FBI break up an enemy spy ring. Directed by: Leslie H. Martinson Actors: Production Company: Mickey Rooney Productions Release Date: 8 December 1954 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.66 : 1 Color: Black and White A uranium prospector is eating a peanut butter sandwich in the desert where atom bomb tests are being done. He becomes radioactive, and helps the FBI break up an enemy spy ring.

metadata.Plot: A uranium prospector is eating a peanut butter sandwich in the desert where atom bomb tests are being done. He becomes radioactive, and helps the FBI break up an enemy spy ring.
metadata.Writer: Blake Edwards, Benedict Freedman, John Fenton Murray
metadata.Actors: Mickey Rooney, Robert Strauss, Elaine Devry
